lnr_en.description: enable bit of luma based noise reduction

rnr_en.description: enable bit of radius based noise reduction

cnr_en.description: enable bit of chroma based noise reduction

snr_en.description: enable bit of skin color based noise reduction

fd_snr_en.description: enable bit of face guided skin color based noise reduction
fd_snr_en.additional_notes: if fd_snr_en = 1, snr is applied on face regions; if fd_snr_en = 0, snr is applied on both face regions and non-face regions

fnr_en.description: enable bit of flatness based noise reduction

blend_cnr_en.description: enable bit of color based noise blending

blend_snr_en.description: enable bit of skin color based blending

lnr_gain_arr_tab.description: luma based noise reduction gain table
lnr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: HNR will be stronger as lnr_gain_arr decreases.

lnr_shift.description: LNR right shift used to adjust LNR LUT input value
lnr_shift.additional_notes: HNR will be stronger as lnr_shift increases.

radial_noise_prsv_adj_tab.description: radial adjustment for noise preserving percentage
radial_noise_prsv_adj_tab.additional_notes: HNR will be stronger denoising as radial_noise_prsv_adj decreases. In general, radial_noise_prsv_adj is a monotonically decreasing curve.

cnr_gain_arr_tab.description: chroma based noise reduction(distance percentage) for peak noise reduction
cnr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: HNR will be stronger as cnr_gain_arr decreases.

cnr_low_thrd_u.description: CNR low-bound threshold for U channel

cnr_low_thrd_v.description: CNR low-bound threshold for V channel

cnr_low_gap_u.description: the difference between the upper and the lower threshold values in U channel are (2^cnr_thrd_gap_u)

cnr_low_gap_v.description: the difference between the upper and the lower threshold values in V channel are (2^cnr_thrd_gap_v)

cnr_adj_gain.additional_notes: HNR will be stronger as cnr_adj_gain decreases.

cnr_scale.description: scale of CNR input before the table look-up.

fnr_gain_arr_tab.description: gain table for flatness based noise reduction
fnr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: HNR will be stronger as fnr_gain_arr decreases.

fnr_gain_clamp_arr_tab.description: filtering gain clamp table for noise reduction
fnr_gain_clamp_arr_tab.additional_notes: HNR will be stronger as fnr_gain_clamp_arr decreases.

fnr_ac_shift.description: FNR activity (variance ) shift before looking up fnr_gain_arr

filtering_nr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: HNR will be stronger as filtering_nr_gain_arr decreases.

abs_amp_shift.description: right shift bit applied coefficient amplitude before looking up filtering_nr_gain_arr

lpf3_percent.additional_notes: low-pass filer will be stronger as lpf3_percent increases.

lpf3_offset.additional_notes: low-pass filer will be stronger as lpf3_offset increases.

lpf3_strength.additional_notes: low-pass filer gradient smoothing will be stronger as lpf3_strength increases.

blend_lnr_gain_arr_tab.description: luma based noise reduction gain table
blend_lnr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: more noise/details will be added back as blending_lnr_gain_arr increases.

blend_cnr_adj_gain.additional_notes: more noise/details will be added back as blend_cnr_adj_gain increases.

blend_snr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: more noise/details will be added back as blending_snr_gain_arr increases. SW tuning parameter need subtract by 1 and set it to HW register.

skin_hue_min.description: Min hue value for skin detection. Instead of negative (Cb/Cr), absolute value |Cb/Cr| is used in HW

skin_hue_max.description: Max hue value for skin detection. Instead of negative (Cb/Cr), absolute value |Cb/Cr| is used in HW

skin_y_min.description: Min Y value for skin detection.

skin_y_max.description: Max Y value for skin detection

skin_saturation_min_y_max.description: Min saturation value for skin when Y=Y_max

skin_saturation_max_y_max.description: Max saturation value for skin when Y=Y_max

skin_saturation_min_y_min.description: Min saturation value for skin when Y=Y_min

skin_saturation_max_y_min.description: Max saturation value for skin when Y=Y_min

skin_boundary_probability.description: skin-tone probability at the boundary of skin-tone range

skin_percent.description: Percentage of skin tone region with skin-tone probability 1

face_boundary.description: the lower bound of face region. Full skin detection is applied within radius smaller than face_boundary * face_radius(from face detection).

face_transition.description: the upper bound of face region. no skin detection is applied within radius larger than face_transition * face_radius(from face detection).

snr_gain_arr_tab.description: skin based noise reduction gain table
snr_gain_arr_tab.additional_notes: HNR will be stronger as snr_gain_arr decreases. SW tuning parameter need subtract by 1 and set it to HW register.

snr_skin_smoothing_str.description: skin map smoothing strength for SNR
